title: Krong Karm
overview: Yoi has four sons: Pathom, Prasong, Kamol and Mongkol. Pathom - the eldest son, falls in love with a prostitute named Reynu and brings her home as a wife, but Yoi despises her and they encounter many obstacles. She will do anything to try to get rid of Reynu.Kamol, the 3rd son, has two wives, Piangpen and Jantra. He was forced to marry Piangpen but the one he really loves is Jantra. Kamol is the only friendly person to Reynu in the family and they develop a brother and sister relationship.Prasong, the 2nd son, is married to Pilai, who also wants to get rid of Reynu. Mongkol - the youngest son, is a cunning and sassy guy. The story will revolve around the relationships within this large family.
